day_care: All day care procedures are covered (Except for Cataract)
restoration_benefit: Auto Restoration of Sum Insured up to 200% once in a year (Cannot be utilized for illness/s for which claim/s was/were made)
Super Restoration up to 100% once in a year (Can be utilized for illness/s for which claim/s was/were made)
no_claim_bonus: 25% after first claim-free year & 20% for each subsequent claim-free year, max up to 100%
co_payment: 10% co-payment is applicable if the Insured age at entry is above 60 years
discounts: 5% if 2 or more family members are covered
25% for major organ donor during renewal
preventive_health_checkup: Benefit available for every claim-free year
modern_treatments: Based on the Sum insured chosen limits differ, refer policy wording for further details
ayush_treatment: Upto 25% of the Basic Sum Insured subject to a maximum of Rs.25000/- per policy year
new_born_baby_cover: Cover starts from 16th day - upto 10% of the Sum Insured or maximum upto Rs.50,000/- (available if the mother is covered under this policy for a continuous period of 12 months)
